name: Dark Start Page (Nov 2015)
description:
A start page without the blinding light for late night sessions. Also changes icon-bounds to round shapes because they look objectively better. Nothing is completely black, as per important Material Design rule.

Unfortunately couldn't change thumbnails, as they seem to be generated somewhat differently. Even !important doesn't seem to do the trick.
additional_info:
Ver 1.0:
- Made everything dark.
- Changed top right icon shapes to circular like profile picture.
- Removed location text as it looked bad.
- Moved Google logo up.
- Added bounding box around Google logo.
